title: JEE Main 2026 session 1 result released: Direct link to download here
description: The National Testing Agency (NTA) has declared the JEE Main 2026 Session 1 results on its official portals, jeemain.nta.ac.in and ntaresults.nic.in. Candidates can download their scorecards using their application number and date of birth. The results include percentile scores, All India Rank, category-wise rank, and subject-wise performance. Over 13 lakh students appeared, with the top 2.5 lakh eligible for JEE Advanced 2026. Session 2 is scheduled from April 2 to 9, 2026.

title: 'Don't lecture us, you can go...': Pentagon's warning to Anthropic
description: The Pentagon is reportedly considering ending its partnership with AI firm Anthropic over restrictions on military use of its technology. Anthropic refuses to allow its AI for mass surveillance of citizens or fully autonomous weapons, frustrating defense officials. While other companies are more accommodating, Anthropic's firm stance on ethical guardrails could lead to a complete termination of their collaboration.

title: Fact check: No, Jutta Leerdam did not suffer a wardrobe malfunction
description: The viral video claiming to show Jutta Leerdam crashing and tearing her suit at the Winter Olympics is false. The clip actually shows Suzanne Schulting at a December 2025 World Cup race in Norway, as reported by NU.nl. Meanwhile, Leerdam won gold at Milano Cortina 2026, with Jake Paul celebrating emotionally.
